chapter.title: Pegasus Components
chapter.para: The DAX is a description of an abstract workflow in XML format that is used as the primary input into Pegasus. The DAX schema is described in dax-3.2.xsd The documentation of the schema and its elements can be found in dax-3.2.html.
A DAX can be created by all users with the DAX generating API in Java, Perl, or Python format
chapter.note: We highly recommend using the DAX API.
chapter.para: Advanced users who can read XML schema definitions can generate a DAX directly from a script
